children.value:
Creates a filter object, based on filter options, to notify when the state changes (logs). To check if the state has
changed, call eth_getFilterChanges
- a string representing the address (20 bytes) to check for balance

- an integer block number, or the string "latest", "earliest" or
"pending"

- an integer block number, or the string "latest", "earliest" or
"pending"
- Array of 32 Bytes DATA topics. Topics are order-dependent.
A note on specifying topic filters:
Topics are order-dependent. A transaction with a log with topics

will be
matched by the following topic filters:
- A in first position (and anything after)
- anything in first position AND B in second position (and anything after)
- A in first position AND B in second position (and anything after)"
] - (A OR B) in first position AND (A OR B) in second position (and anything after)
- A string denoting the newly created filter id
